original_title: Hand Solo: A DP XXX Parody
overview: When a smuggler ship explodes around a nearby planet, every smuggler in the galaxy wants a piece of the prize! Hand Solo, joined by his trusty crew of misfits, takes a perilous journey through space with the ultimate goal of becoming the most revered smuggler in the galaxy (and every inviting pussy that comes with it)!
title: Hand Solo: A DP XXX Parody
